channel.title: Need help for commands and playrights in names
channel.description:
Hey, you know how some commands are only for some people? it will say like c.=playername "homework'" or or something like that.\
well how do i add 2 people?
Please help me. i admit im not very well handed when it comes to coding.

item.title: Need help for commands and playrights in names
item.dc:creator: @Spud_pickles Spud pickles
item.description:
@Spud_pickles wrote:

(c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“spud pickles”) || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ic3 cr34m”) || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("…") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("…"))) {

there you go buddy

Read full topic
item.source: Need help for commands and playrights in names
